participant_1.background:
I am dedicated to my interests and find creative ways to learn more about them.
i can speak three languages english , french and spanish.
My favorite place to eat is the ice cream shop where I take my hunting dog after a long day of adventuring.
I enjoyed playing games with my friends and going on adventures together.
my favorite music is jimi hendrix.

participant_2.background:
I'm a YouTube that's always hungry, so I spend my day looking for the best food videos to watch.
I'm a free spirit who is driven by my passion.
my favorite band is muse.
I used to be very closed off about my sexuality.
I am proud of my ability to find affordable and delicious food at the deli.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
Hi, I love to watch YouTube videos and go on food adventures.
That's great! What are some of your favorite YouTube channels?
I really love to watch cooking videos. I recently found a channel called Binging with Babish and I'm obsessed.
I love that channel! I've made a few of his recipes and they've all been delicious.
Me too! I've made the carbonara and the ramen and they were both amazing.
I've been meaning to try the ramen. I love ramen.
You won't be disappointed. It's so easy to make and it's so delicious.
I'll have to make it soon.
You should! You won't regret it.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and go out with friends.
I love video games too! What games do you play?
I mostly play action-adventure games. I'm a big fan of the Assassin's Creed series and the Uncharted series.
I love those games too! I've played all of the Assassin's Creed games and I've played a few of the Uncharted games.
They're so good! I'm really excited for the new Assassin's Creed game coming out next year.
Me too! I've been waiting for it for a long time.
It looks like it's going to be a lot of fun.
I think it's going to be the best one yet.
I hope so!
Me too!
